title: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps are deployed
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps and accessing a URL, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps, it should return a HTTP error 404 response.
SR: Fix the issue in Tomcat 7 where accessing a URL in a instance with no webapps returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content instead of a HTTP error 404 response.
